overview.en: LITEX is an off-chain solution built on a multi-layered network (LTXN) that connects to all public blockchains supporting Lightning Network (or equivalent) protocols and smart contracts. It provides faster and cheaper transactions, enables cross-chain smart contracts interoperability and facilitates atomic-swaps between cryptocurrencies. By connecting public blockchains, LTXN is able to generate network effect. LITEX aims to become the infrastructure of the future ditial world.
overview.zh: LITEX 是去中心化的价值交换生态，以第二层网络——LITEX Network为基础，承载小微支付、去中心化交易所等上层应用，打通数字世界与现实世界的连接，实现加密货币互换、智能合约跨链交互，连接公链孤岛形成网络效应。LITEX是未来数字世界的基础设施。
